public SinglePlayer(int mode,
                    int difficulty,
                    int playerCode,
                    java.lang.String playerName)
Constructor of the class to create the maze game.

Parameters:
mode - the mode of the single game (ADVENTURE_MODE/COIN_MODE).
difficulty - the difficulty of the game.
playerCode - the code representing the player's character.
playerName - the name of the player.
